湳字的基本解释

湳
nǎn
古河名，源出中国今内蒙古自治区，流入黄河。
姓。

湳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nǎn］
［《廣韻》奴感切，上感，泥。］
(1)古水名。黄河支流。源出今内蒙古自治区伊克昭盟准格尔旗北面。一说，即黄甫川。见北魏郦道元《水经注·河水三》。
(2)姓。

湳字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湳； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页638第20
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?乃感切，音喃。【說文】西河美稷保東北水。【水經注】湳水，出西河郡美稷縣。　又地名。【後漢·西羌傳】先零卑湳，?皆彊富。

湳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
湳字的起名意思

暂无。

Nan
Basic explanation of words
Nan
nǎn
The name of the ancient river originated from the present-day Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region of China and flows into the Yellow River.
name.
Nan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nǎn］
["Guangyun" has a sense of slavery, upper sense, and mud. ]
(1) Ancient water name. A tributary of the Yellow River. It originated in the north of Zhungeer Banner, Yikezhao League, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region. One said, Huang Fuchuan. See Li Daoyuan of the Northern Wei Dynasty, "Shui Jing Zhu · River Water III".
(2) Last name.
Nan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　湳; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 638 No. 20
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? It's a touch, muttering. [Said the text] Xihe Meiji protects northeast water. [Shui Jing Zhu] Nanshui, out of Meji County, Xihe County.　Also place name. [Later Han·Xiqiang Biography] The first is to be zero, and all are strong and prosperous.
Nan
